wms_article.title: Hera names Felix of Stray Kids as global ambassador

wms_article_body.body: Hera, a cosmetics brand under Amorepacific Corp., announced Tuesday it has appointed Felix, a member of the K-pop group Stray Kids, as its new global ambassador. Felix will officially begin his role with the global campaign for Hera’s new “Reflection Skin Glow” line, launching at the end of August 2025. Next month, the brand will also introduce “Brownie Boy,” a new shade of its Sensual Nude Gloss inspired by Felix. Hera plans to work with Felix to promote the brand’s philosophy and values in markets including Korea, Japan, and Thailand. “Felix is a global icon who inspires the world with his unique mood and deep energy,” a Hera official said. “Together, we will present a fresh interpretation of ‘beauty in your own way,’ which Hera strives to achieve.”
